item.title: NV-787 North
item.description: NV-787 North (Hanson St.) in Winnemucca. NV-787 is a short state highway that connects NV-294 with Winnemucca Blvd. (BL-80 and US-95). There appears to only be one shield along the entire length of the road.

item.title: NV-294 South at NV-787
item.description: NV-294 South at NV-787 (Hanson St.) NV-787 is not signed at this intersection, and is instead signed as to I-80 (via Winnemucca Blvd.).
